title: What do I do about Botters?
body:
We all have them, but my question how do we deal with them? What sort of report should I do? Do I report them for being AFK, or do I report them for intentional griefing, what?

Also, what are the penalties of having a bot control your character?

replies.body:
You should report this to the riot support services since you know that the player is botting  then you should screenshot it, including  a written evidence with relevance to the  attachments of those images that will prove to riot that they are using it.

Penalties are most likely a permanent ban of the players account.

I'm sorry, but I was talking about the reports at the end of the game, which one do I report them for. I should try to add them so I know which players are botting, but yeah as a general report at the end of a game what report should I file?

Okay thanks guys. I will take your advice on dealing with these guys. I haven't seen many in PvP, but they are rampant in Coop vs AI and I have seen more than one in ARAM. 

One more question, should I try adding summoner names into this post so people can see them, or is this just a pointless idea?

> One more question, should I try adding summoner names into this post so people can see them, or is this just a pointless idea?

You could but it would probably mean a mod would delete the post sooner or later since "naming and shaming" is against the boards rules.
Oh, yeah. I probably shouldn't do it then.

Reporting them from end game wouldn't fit in terms of the subject that you are reporting them for.

For you to report the player that is botting it is better to report this to the riots support and services instead, with the evidence you have you can prove to riot the players account is botted.
I report them for "assisting enemy team" It seems the most fitting in my opinion.
